name: EveryWare Global Inc. (EVRYQ) Long Term Growth Estimates History
description:
Long Term Growth Estimates History for EveryWare Global Inc. (EVRYQ) per Zacks Research.

Exchage:

Currency: USD

Ticker: EVRYQ

Zacks Perm Ticker: ROIQ

OBS_DATE: Observation date on which these metrics were calculated.

LTG_MEAN_EST: Mean estimate for long-term growth (LTG). This estimate is for the next 3 to 5 years for both earnings and sales.

LTG_MEDIAN_EST: Median estimate for long-term growth (LTG).

LTG_CNT_EST: Number of estimates for long-term growth (LTG).

LTG_HIGH_EST: High estimate for long-term growth (LTG). This estimate is for the next 3 to 5 years for both earnings and sales.

LTG_LOW_EST: Low estimate for long-term growth (LTG). This estimate is for the next 3 to 5 years for both earnings and sales.

LTG_STD_DEV_EST: Standard deviation of estimate for long-term growth (LTG)

LTG_CNT_EST_REV_UP: Number of revisions up for long-term growth (LTG)

LTG_CNT_EST_REV_DOWN: Number of revisions down for long-term growth (LTG)

Premium Support is available for subscribers of this dataset: premium_support@quandl.com
